overview: Michelleâ€™s drive to succeed leads to her fear of commitment but Chris dreams of the ultimate romance. Despite their differences, their friendship blossoms into an almost relationship, until Michelle must decide whether to take a job in another town or take a risk on love.
tagline: After moving in together, two old friends rekindle their romance, but will they seize their moment or let it pass them by?
title: Missing Moments
